text: melum, penkalil vivakattai nata mutiyata (mutirntu) vayatai ataintu vitta penkal, tankal alakalankarattai(p pirarukku) veliyakkatavarkalana nilaiyil, tankal melataikalaik kalarriyiruppatu, avarkal mitu kurramillai anal (itanaiyum avarkal tavirttu) olunkaip penikkolvatu avarkalukku mikavum nalamaka irukkum. Allah (yavarraiyum) ceviyerpavan; nankaripavan
